title: A history of Istanbul
itunes:title: A history of Istanbul
itunes:subtitle: Historian Bettany Hughes talks to Peter Frankopan about her new book exploring Istanbul's diverse history, from its earliest days through to the upheavals of the 21st century  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
description:
Historian Bettany Hughes talks to Peter Frankopan about her new book exploring Istanbul's diverse history, from its earliest days through to the upheavals of the 21st century

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
